name: Cope + flexi - julia set (strange days)bdrv2

shapecode_1_border_a=0.100

shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0

shapecode_2_g=0.000

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000

shapecode_2_border_a=0.100

shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_b = int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_2=wave_r = int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_3=wave_g = int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_4=wave_y =wave_y-ypos*q3;
per_frame_5=wave_x =wave_x-xpos*q3;
per_frame_6=bass_eff = max(max(bass,bass_att)-1,0);
per_frame_7=bass_thresh = above(bass_att,bass_thresh)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_thresh))*((bass_thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_8=vol =bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_9=dx = 0.005 + q3*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_10=dy = 0.005 + q3*( 0.60*sin(0.234*time) + 0.40*sin(0.277*time) );
per_frame_11=dx_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2)*0.016*sin(time*7) + (q2-equal(bass_thresh,2))*dx_residual;
per_frame_12=dy_residual = equal(bass_thresh,2)*0.012*sin(time*9) + (q2-equal(bass_thresh,2))*dy_residual;
per_frame_13=rot = q3 + 0.030*( 0.60*sin(0.381*time) + 0.40*sin(0.479*time) );
per_frame_14=ob_size=mytime*q3;
per_frame_15=ib_a=1-mytime+bass;
per_frame_16=ib_r =int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_17=ib_b =int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_18=ib_g =int(rand(100))/100;
per_frame_19=mytime=.5;
per_frame_20=q1=sin(time*mytime*4);
per_frame_21=q2=sin(time*mytime*2);
per_frame_22=q3=abs(rad-.5)*q2;
per_frame_23=xpos=.5;
per_frame_24=ypos=.5;
per_frame_25=monitor =q3;
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+.05*q3+.05*q3;
per_pixel_2=dx=.01*atan((rad)+q2*sin((xpos*dx)*10+mytime*5));
per_pixel_3=dy=.01*atan((rad)+q2*sin((ypos*dy)*10+mytime*5));
per_pixel_4=it = 0.3*sin(time*0.2);
per_pixel_5=radm = rad*0.5;
per_pixel_6=rot = 0.02*sin((radm+it)*30)/((rad+0.1)*((sin(time)*0.4+0.5)*20));
per_pixel_7=mod = sin(ang*5);
per_pixel_8=mod = mod*mod;
per_pixel_9=zoom = .99 - abs(0.01*mod);
per_pixel_10=mx = (x-.5)*1.33;
per_pixel_11=my = y - .5;
per_pixel_12=
per_pixel_13=sw = above(rad,.4) + below(rad,.04) + above(rad,.3)*below(rad,.4)*(rad-.3)*5;
per_pixel_14=sw = above(rad,.3)*(rad-.3)*5;
per_pixel_15=
per_pixel_16=zoom = 1 - .1*sw;
per_pixel_17=
per_pixel_18=rot = 0 + .2*sw;
per_pixel_19=
per_pixel_20=dx = (1-sw)*sin(ang)*.001*.75;
per_pixel_21=dy = (1-sw)*cos(ang)*.001;
per_pixel_22=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_23=
per_pixel_24=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_25=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_26=zoom = zoom + 0.01;
per_pixel_27=zoom = zoom + (0.05 + 0.04*sin(time))*(0.2*sin(ang*time));
per_pixel_28=rot = rot + 0.01*(0.5*cos(ang*5*bass*time));
per_pixel_29=
per_pixel_30=dx = dx + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dx_r;
per_pixel_31=dy = dy + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dy_r;
per_pixel_32=rot=0.1*pow(-ang,3)-1.18*sin(ang);
per_pixel_33=zoom=(1.9+sin(time/2)*0.45)*sin(-rad)+1.3+ sin(rad);
per_pixel_34=dx = dx + 0.09*sin(q8*0.785);
per_pixel_35=dy = dy + 0.09*sin(q8*0.675);
per_pixel_36=//zoom = zoom +q7;
per_pixel_37=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_38=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.15*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_39=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.15*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_40=
per_pixel_41=zoom = zoom - 0.01;
per_pixel_42=zoom = zoom + dx_r*3*tan(dy_r*(2*(sin(3*bass_att)*0.5-rad*(2-rad)*sin(12*rad))*bass_att*4));
per_pixel_43=zoom = zoom - dy_r*3*tan(dx_r*(2*(sin(4*bass_att)*(0.75-rad)*sin(6*ang))*bass_att*4));
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    //ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`    
warp_6=`    float2 zoom = 2+q3;
warp_7=`    float2 c = float2(0.3, 0.42);    
warp_8=`    float2 uxy = (float2(uv.x-0.5, uv.y-0.5))*zoom;
warp_9=` 
warp_10=`    // +-* by different constants in different parts
warp_11=`    // changes the shape without impacting its depth too much
warp_12=`    uxy = (float2((uxy.x*uxy.x) - (0.3*uxy.y*uxy.y), 2*uxy.x*uxy.y*1.1)+c);
warp_13=`    
warp_14=` 
warp_15=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_fc_main, uxy).xyz +0.01;    
warp_16=`        
warp_17=` }
comp_1=`shader_body 
comp_2=`{ 
comp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*8; 
comp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) ); 
comp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) ); 
comp_6=`    float2 light_pos = float2(q1,q2); 
comp_7=`    float3 col = float3(4,4,4); 
comp_8=`    float c = 4; 
comp_9=`    float dd = 16; 
comp_10=`    float3 plastic; 
comp_11=`    plastic.x = col.x/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.x,dy.x)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_12=`    plastic.y = col.y/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_13=`    plastic.z = col.z/(1+dd*pow(length( uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*c - light_pos),0.5)); 
comp_14=`
comp_15=`    ret = plastic*GetPixel(uv); 
comp_16=`    ret *= 1.5;
comp_17=`}
